resources.string: Choose between brilliant colors or a faithful reproduction of the creator\'s intended vision to create an unforgettable visual experience
Enable External Monitor to customize external camera settings and utilize your Xperia\'s display as a reliable and accurate viewfinder for capturing vibrant, true-to-life colors
Adjust Dolby Sound settings to experience immersive, multidimensional sound that envelops you, bringing movies, music, and games to life
Personalize spatial sound settings and transform ordinary stereo audio sources into captivating auditory experiences
Optimize battery longevity by adjusting the maximum charging percentage and fine-tuning other charging settings
When the Battery Share feature is enabled, your device becomes capable of wirelessly transferring power to other Qi eligible device
